channel.title: Boise Tech Connect Podcast
channel.description: Conversations with Boise’s innovators, founders and community leaders. Tune in for stories, lessons and visions of the future.
channel.itunes:author: Boise Tech Connect

item.title: Episode 5: Building a Startup in Boise
item.description: Our guest Sarah Hughes shares her journey from hackathon idea to thriving SaaS business. Learn about the resources and mentors that helped her along the way.

item.title: Episode 4: The Future of Web Development
item.description: Host John sits down with two Boise developers to discuss the rising adoption of WebAssembly, Rust and AI tools in modern development workflows.

item.title: Episode 3: Bootstrapping vs Venture Capital
item.description: We explore two paths to funding with serial entrepreneur Mike Palmer. Hear how he bootstrapped his first company and why he chose venture capital funding for his second.
